definitions.text: a deep and vivid red color
turn red, as if in embarrassment or shame
examples: The girl blushed when a young man whistled as she walked by

definitions.text: of a color at the end of the color spectrum (next to orange); resembling the color of blood or cherries or tomatoes or rubies
characterized by violence or bloodshed; - Andrea Parke; - Thomas Gray; - Hudson Strode
examples: writes of crimson deeds and barbaric days

definitions.text: (especially of the face) reddened or suffused with or as if with blood from emotion or exertion
